Class ReportController

java.lang.Object
com.example.controller.ReportController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ReportController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for Reports - Handles the displaying of reports and allows for modification of reports

    • selectMonthType

      public void selectMonthType(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Month ComboBox for Appointment by Month/Type report. Gets value of selected month, and stores it in a local variable to be processed by the selectedType method. Then sets the type comboBox as visible.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • selectMonthCustomer

      public void selectMonthCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Additional Custom Report. This method listens for the action event on the custom additional report. It takes the value of the comboBox and uses that value in a method call to the Appointment class for further processing. The return value of this method call is a string. Once the string value is determined this method check to see if the value = null, if so - it displays a message in the text field of the report to say "No Appointments this Month". If the value of the return is not null, it assigns the text of the report to the returned String.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • allMonths

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Month> allMonths()
      Populates the Month values for both month comboBoxes. Sets a new observable list, then loops with an iterator from 1-12. Upon each loop, it calls the Month object method to get the month value associated with the current iterator value. It adds this month object to the allMonths Observable List.
      Returns:
      allMonths observable List.

    • selectContact

      public void selectContact(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Contact Schedule Report. Listens for an action event on the contact comboBox. When an action is heard, it gets the value of the comboBox selection and calls a method on the Contact class to get the Contact object in reference. If then adds the result of a method call to the Appointments Class to get a list of Appointments by Contact using the value of the Contact object's id. It then populates the table with the results of the calls.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • closeBTN

      public void closeBTN(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Close Button on Report Page. Listens for an action event on the close button. If heard, sets the stage back to the main stage and closes the report stage.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - close button on report page.
